text: Python code generator for Visual Studio?
I had an idea, if I add a python .py file to my C# project, and tag the file with a custom generator that would execute the python file, and treat the output as the result of the code generation, ie.
put it into a C# file, that would allow me to do quite a lot of code generation as part of the build process.
Does anyone know if such a custom generator for Visual Studio 2008 exists?
